name: Magic Line - Lines 98
description:
Magic Line with the quality graphics , great sound , Magic Line is ready to bring you the feeling of " happiness " in the gaming experience .

Game is simple , you just sort of the same color balls adjacent vertically , horizontally , diagonally so that all 5 balls, you will get score. Score after game over will be convert to the money to buy the Boost.

When you collect enough coin, you can buy the Strong boost skill to use it for destroying the ball quickly, very fun.

Magic Line has the function of auto-save your game plays to not lose points when you exit the game.

Game center, share Facebook with the Image in game, hope you are interested.

I wish you happy in game . If you have suggestions , you let the comment stay here , we will continue to receive your opinions to make game better ... :p
